API Reference

This section provides detailed documentation for all the modules and classes in pyHaasAPI.

Core Modules

  • pyHaasAPI package
    • Subpackages
    • Submodules
  • pyHaasAPI.api module
  • pyHaasAPI.models package
    • Submodules
  • pyHaasAPI.lab module
  • pyHaasAPI.market_manager module

Main API Module

The main API module provides the core functionality for interacting with the HaasOnline API.

Client Module

The client module handles the low-level HTTP communication with the HaasOnline API.

Models

Data models used throughout the library for type safety and validation.

Lab Management

Advanced lab management and backtesting functionality.

Market Manager

Efficient market data fetching and management.

Exceptions

Custom exceptions used by pyHaasAPI.

Types

Type definitions and utilities.

Utilities

Utility functions and helpers.

Parameter Handling

Advanced parameter management for labs and bots.

Price API

Specialized API for market price data.
